about_the_game:
🧟 Survive the Pixelated Apocalypse!

The world has fallen, and the undead roam the streets! In this action-packed pixel shooter, you must fight for survival against relentless zombie hordes. Scavenge for supplies, upgrade your weapons, trade for valuable resources, and complete missions to uncover the secrets of the apocalypse. Explore vast blocky landscapes, face terrifying bosses, and prove that you have what it takes to stay alive in this brutal world!

🔫 Intense Zombie Combat

The undead never stop coming, and each battle is a desperate struggle to survive. Arm yourself with a vast arsenal, from pistols and shotguns to flamethrowers and explosives. Every zombie is a unique threat—some are slow and mindless, while others are fast, aggressive, and deadly. Master precise shooting, conserve ammo, and use your skills wisely to outlast the onslaught.

🌍 Explore a Dangerous World

Venture into sprawling blocky landscapes filled with ruins, abandoned cities, eerie forests, and secret underground bunkers. Every location hides valuable resources, powerful weapons, and deadly threats. But be warned—the world changes as you explore. A dynamic day-night cycle makes zombies more aggressive after dark, turning familiar streets into nightmarish battlegrounds.

💀 Face Monstrous Bosses

Survival is tough, but the real challenge lies in taking down the terrifying bosses that lurk in the most dangerous zones. These monstrous enemies have unique abilities, requiring quick reflexes and the right strategy to defeat. Use the environment to your advantage, upgrade your weapons, and claim rare loot to strengthen your survival chances.

💰 Trade and Manage Resources

In a world where everything is scarce, survival depends on smart resource management. Scavenge for supplies, trade with NPCs and other survivors, and barter for weapons, ammo, and medical kits. Every decision matters—hoard too much, and you’ll slow yourself down; trade recklessly, and you may find yourself unprepared when danger strikes.

📜 Complete Missions and Uncover Secrets

Beyond the fight for survival, Zombie Blocks: Pixel Shooter Gun offers dynamic quests and story-driven missions that reveal the secrets of the apocalypse. Aid survivors, track down rare supplies, and eliminate high-value targets. Each quest brings new challenges, rewards, and unexpected twists to your adventure.

⚔️ Upgrade, Adapt, and Survive

As the zombie threat grows, so must your arsenal. Upgrade your weapons with silencers, extended magazines, and high-powered scopes. Customize your gear, craft survival tools, and develop your own unique combat style. Whether you prefer stealth, brute force, or tactical precision, the choice is yours.

🎮 A Unique Blend of Pixel Art and Hardcore Action

With its signature blocky aesthetic and adrenaline-fueled shooter mechanics, Zombie Blocks: Pixel Shooter Gun delivers an intense survival experience like no other. Every moment is a fight for your life, and every decision shapes your future. Are you ready to face the horde and carve your own path in the apocalypse?

name: Zombie Blocks: Pixel Shooter Gun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Fight for survival in a blocky zombie apocalypse! 🧟‍♂️ Use powerful weapons, explore dangerous locations, and take on deadly bosses. Trade, complete quests, and gather resources to stay alive. Every battle is intense—can you survive the horde? 🔫💀
